description: Even numbers n with an odd number of prime factors.
example: a(3)=66 because 66 is even and prime divisors are 2, 3 and 11, an odd number.
maple: ts_m2_sod := proc(n); if (numtheory[mobius](n)=-1 and isprime(n)='false' and type(n,even)='true') then RETURN(n); fi end: am2sod := [seq(ts_m2_sod(i), i=1..2500)]: am2sod;
author: _Enoch Haga_, Mar 28 2000
